record.label: set.group.dep
record.comments: for $L.i = $L.element to lng(data in $L.work) do (if (not null(28 in $L.i in data in $L.work)) then (28 in $L.i in data in $L.work=str($L.element)+":"+str(28 in $L.i in data in $L.work)))

statements.statements: for $L.i = ($L.element+1) to lng(data in $L.work) do ($L.z=index(1 in $L.i in data in $L.work, $L.components);if ($L.z>0 and same($L.element, 30 in $L.i in data in $L.work)) then ($L.parent.line=NULL;$L.dep=index($L.z in $L.groups, dependent.group in $L.part.save);if ($L.dep>0) then (32 in $L.i in data in $L.work=nullsub($L.dep in dependency.type in $L.parent, "close");$L.par.group=$L.dep in parent.group in $L.part.save;if (not (null($L.par.group))) then ($L.continue=true;while ($L.continue and not (null($L.par.group))) do (for $L.line = ($L.element+1) to lng(denull(data in $L.work)) do (if null($L.parent.line) then if (28 in $L.line in data in $L.work=$L.par.group and not (null(4 in $L.line in data in $L.work))) then ($L.parent.line=$L.line;$L.continue=false;$L.line=lng(denull(data in $L.work))+1));if $L.continue then ($L.dep=index($L.par.group, dependent.group in $L.part.save);if ($L.dep=0) then ($L.continue=false) else ($L.par.group=$L.dep in parent.group in $L.part.save)));17 in $L.i in data in $L.work=nullsub($L.parent.line, 17 in $L.i in data in $L.work)))))

comments.more.comments.more: if (nullsub(11 in $L.element in data in $L.work, false)=false) then for $L.i = ($L.element+1) to lng(data in $L.work) do (if null(28 in $L.i in data in $L.work) then (28 in $L.i in data in $L.work=28 in $L.element in data in $L.work;17 in $L.i in data in $L.work=17 in $L.element in data in $L.work))
